name: Pan Man Wilson - Unfinished
description:
The world is in danger. The sky is raining meteors. The volcano is active. The scientist has made a new invention, the Giant pan, and Wilson is hungry.

Despite the fact that it is raining meteors and an eruption is going on, Pan Man Wilson has a meal to cook! Pan Man Wilson has to get to the lava in order to cook his meal. With the use of his Giant Pan, he can manipulate the meteors to his advantage to create a good time out of the bad times.

Keyboard/Mouse:

WASD -  Move
Left Shift - Run
Space - Jump
Left Click - Whack

Controller:

Left Stick - Move
Circle - Run
X - Jump
Square - Whack
